Web Standards Coder Designer Advocate

19 Dec 2006

theMechanism, a graphic design and maxi-media agency with offices in NYC and London seeks a designer and web-standards xHTML coder of the highest order.

If you're up to snuff, we'll even consider putting the title of "Code Gorilla/Gorillette" on your business card. Here's the deal: We're seeking someone for our New York City office with proven CSS driven, web-standards encoding techniques and mySQL and .php development.

Proficiency in .net, Perl, JavaScript and ActionScript development may win you a few extra points as well.

\n

Send a resume and links to work that survives HTML validation to smterry@theMechanism.com
